tracks.text: In the Taskmaster house foyer, an egg balances on an upright hoola hoop. Text types out, Grappling with my life
Greg Davies sits on a throne. He's a tall man with a beard and glasses.
A blonde woman
A brown haired man
A brown skinned man
A red haired woman
A white haired man
Alex, sits a head lower than Greg. His loud green socks peak beneath his trousers.
He holds an aluminum can with the word "Worms"
Sophie grimaces
He puts the can away
An open mouthed fish jug
A book titled Edvard Grieg, Diaries Articles Speeches
He is the shortest contestant by half a head.
eggs benedict
3 eggs with googly eyes and clothes. One resembles Greg.
A wooden peg with silver yarn hair, a drawn face, and clothes
An old fashioned photo of Greg in a top hat, glasses, and a long beard. A clock appears over it.
An egg with googly eyes sits on a round table in a room, next to a Taskmaster envelope. Above the table is the photo of Greg, surrounded by porcelain vases, candlesticks, and a toy carriage.
Nick enters, dressed like Dracula
Sophie wears overalls. Separately, John wears a yellow jacket and bends to look under the table.
Steve wears a shirt printed to look like a tuxedo.
Steve holds the toy carriage
Joanne cuts bubblewrap
She tapes layers of bubble wrap together.
The egg boils
She holds a bubble wrap pillow the size of her torso. Outside, Nick places the egg on a large platfrom.
Joanne stands on a ladder
and throws the bubble pillow at a fence. It bounces off.
Nick throws a brick at the egg.
Joanne and Alex use rackets to pass the bubble pillow
Nick tosses another brick. Freeze frame of the brick above the egg
It lands next to and bounces over the egg.
2 feet away
3 feet away
Joanne punches and beats the pillow
She kicks it
Nick faces away and tosses the brick over his shoulder
It lands hard and the egg bounces away
The egg cracked on bounce
He props up the egg against a brick
A crow sits on the house
The crow grabs the top of the egg
The egg sits in the driver's seat of a car
John in the passenger seat
An egg sits on a plastic cow.
The car turns slightly to avoid the cow
The car knocks over a pile of bricks
The driving egg's googly eyes wink
The egg sits on a carriage, drawn by a goat
Puppets on a stick
Between Alex's legs
He opens the door
The door knocks the egg out of the carriage
Steve picks up the egg
He hides the crack with his hand and takes the egg away
She places a small porcelain object on top of her head
The egg lies in her hair
It slides right
It fell into her hand, into her elbow
And onto the table
The yolk is out
She stands, does a lunge, then retakes her seat
Steve 5, Joanne 5, Sophie 3

In the courtyard, 3 sets of walls touch at the center, then fan out. Each angle of walls has 3 sets of rolled up blinds, a paint roller, and tubes of colored paints. The angles are connected with red string.
John joins Sophie, where they stand in the wall angles
John can't see Sophie
A sign with the order
Steve draws a line at the height of his nipples.
Sophie paints the wall red
They paint
She painted the blinds and wall. One blind is a bull doing disco and another is a messy penguin
A giraffe with 6 legs and a baby saying High
Disconnected sections
2 panels are a car, 2 are pink blobs, 2 are Sophie's
A scarecrow made of pillow cases, pants and boots stands in a field by a river. Crows fly over a nearby field
A task sits in the center of hoola hoops.
Nick, in Dracula face paint, runs through knee high grass
The scarecrow
A gorilla statue on a boat
The boat rides slowly down the river
He runs upriver to the gorilla
Too far right
Too left
Too close
Too left, then too far
He looks at the river.
Way too far
Knee high
Waist high
Gary approaches the finish line
Nick finds a string and pulls
The string pulls Gary back
Gary wears a hoop. Nick gets out.
Bounces off Gary
Slightly too left
Joanne's bounces off
Too left
John bounces off
Steve lands
Joanne lands
John misses then lands
He lands one, then tosses his last hoop and walks away
Sophie looks down
A gorilla head floats through the grass
She tosses the largest hoop, which lands in a tree
Too far
Too left
Too left
Too far
In the boat. Gary passes her
Way too far left
She grabs 2 hoops and runs after Gary
Bounces
In the boat
In the river, she grabs a hoop
Too far
She splashes
She falls
She splashes
Nick 9
The contestants sit at small desks with markers and a drawing canvas
Added a face and genitals
Now teeth and lips
Face using the sausage as a mouth with pointy teeth
Sausage has a pondering face and thought bubble with question mark
Sausage wearing a sash with arms and legs
Pitchfork, legs, tail, horns
Sausage has evil eyes and holding something
Pitchfork is a racket, hands have circles, purple lines behind
5 circles
Alex hides his face
He picks up a white pawn from the mantle behind him
Steve walks on stage as credits roll.
Steve shows off the fish jug
He pours fluid over the eggs benedict
He kisses the Peg Mavis and raises one finger in the air
He picks the Greg egg, drops it on the table, and it bounces. He shrugs.
